comment: Terrible!! Avoid downloading if you can. Can't use the edit button. Crashes each time I click on it. Then I'm told there's a bug in the app and wait for this to be fixed by the developers. How I wished I hadn't updated it.
scenarios: Click on the edit button, and the app crashes.
key sentence: Click on the edit button, and the app crashes.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to navigate to library/memories/search, cast content, back up photos, favorite items, and access various editing and sharing options.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Navigate up', 'description': 'Move to the parent screen'}, {'name': 'Favorite', 'description': 'Mark the item as a favorite'}, {'name': 'More options', 'description': 'Access additional options'}, {'name': 'Cast', 'description': 'Cast the photo.'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share the item with others'}, {'name': 'Edit', 'description': 'Edit the item'}, {'name': 'Lens', 'description': 'Open the lens feature'}, {'name': 'Delete', 'description': 'Delete the item'}]
